## Summary

<p>
        This repo is a useful to for accessing Ipeadata^[https://www.ipeadata.gov.br/Default.aspx] info through API. Its plataform contains several databases involving three main areas: Macroeconomics, Regional and Social data. Further details are available here:
        
   Readme - User Guide [en-us](readme.en-us.md) 

  Leiame - Manual [pt-br](leiame.pt-br.md)
</p>
